code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./navigation.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navigation(){const[click,setClick]=useState(false);const[button,setButton]=useState(true);const handleClick=()=>setClick(!click);const closeMobileMenu=()=>setClick(false);const showButton=()=>{if(window.innerWidth<=960){setButton(false);}else{setButton(true);}};useEffect(()=>{showButton();window.addEventListener('resize',showButton);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('resize',showButton);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navigation-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu-icon",onClick:handleClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:click?'fas fa-times':'fas fa-bars'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:click?'nav-menu active':'nav-menu',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/entry-exit",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Entry/Exit"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profiles",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Profile"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/logout",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Logout"})})]})]})})});}export default Navigation;
